des: "This cocktail reminds me of a green apple sour candy but with a nice twist!"
ins: Pour the vodka, schnapps, and triple sec into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Wet the rim of a chilled martini glass with a lime wedge, and dip into the sour candy powder. Strain the cocktail into the martini glass to serve.
